name: Chris's Dad
description: Can out-drink everyone around him, and if you get him drunk enough, he'll jump a fence just to prove he can do it.

name: Candra's Dad
description: Always knows a guy who knows a guy, and is a never-ending supply of sarcasm and famous Desoto, TX BBQ.

name: Misty's Dad
description: Ultimate gardener; can fix up your fickle fiddle-leaf fig or get your begonias back to blooming in no time.

name: Konner's Dad
description: The neighborhood's favorite handy-man, can hold his alcohol like he can hold his screws...and he NEVER drops a screw.

name: Bonnie's Dad
description: Super-human ability to know exactly what to say to make someone uncomfortable.

name: Black Widow
description: Master spy & assassin, martial artist, armed combatant; skills in espionage, infiltration, disguise and deception, manipulation & hacking.

name: Hawkeye
description: Marksmanship, assassin, marital artist, knife & sword master and expert pilot.

name: Ant Man
description: Genius-level intellect, size-changing via Pym Particles, telepathic communication with insects, dimension-hopping.

name: Winter Soldier
description: Energy blasts, superhuman strength, martial artist, speed, healing, stamina.

name: Jessica Jones
description: Superhuman strength, flight, immunity to mind control.

name: Loki
description: Strength, stamina, speed, genius, mastery of magic and illusion, energy projection, shapeshifting.

name: Star Lord
description: Strength, flight via jet boots, master problem-solver, cybernetic enhancements, space travel, Element Gun that projects air, earth, fire, water.

name: Gamora
description: Acrobatics, martial artist, marksmanship, regenerative healing powers, infinity cloak

name: Storm
description: Power over the weather, skilled thief, excellent with handguns and knives, ability to see in darkness.

name: Dr. Strange
description: Flight via his Cloak of Levitation, martial artist, wind & flame projection, telekinesis, hypnotism, ability to jump through dimensions.

name: Wolverine
description: Reflexes, agility, senses, retractable adamantium-plated bone claws, regeneration, indestructible skeleton.

name: Iron Man
description: Genius-level intellect, multiple powered armor suits, ability to fly.

name: Captain America
description: Strength, agility, stamina, healing ability, expert tactician, martial artist, indestructible shield.

name: Spider-Man
description: Strength, jumping, leaping, speed, “danger sense” precognition, custom web-shooters.

name: Vision
description: Superhuman strength & durability; density manipulation, flight, energy blasts, synthetic material generation, mental & computer interaction, genius-level intellect & master combatant.

name: Dr. Manhattan
description: Time travel, disintegration, replication, colossal growth, teleportation, space travel,

name: Scarlet Witch
description: Telekinesis, telepathy, teleportation, flight, manipulation of reality, time, fire, weather and energy.

name: Black Panther
description: Enhanced senses, superhuman condition, speed, martial artist, magical resistance, Vibranium-assisted outfit.

name: Hulk
description: Strength, speed, stamina, durability, regeneration, nigh invulnerability, breathing underwater.

name: Captian Marvel
description: Strength, speed, stamina, resistant to most toxins, energy absorption and manipulation.

name: Thor
description: Strength, speed, stamina, durability, weather manipulation, flight (via Mjolnir), dense skin and bones with a resistance to injury.
